title: Inferno amumu chroma in oce
body:
Will there be anyway to get this skin chroma and Icon in Oce since I'm not aware of any OCE streamers  who have a wide enough audience to offer the codes too.

So will this skin/chromer/icon not be available in OCE and lesser streaming regions {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body:
I've already said this in another discussion but I figure reposting it here would not hurt.

I understand, Amumu is the reason I started playing this game, the only thing I played getting to level 30 back in the day, my favourite champion, my most played champion of all time and I have every piece of additional content for him to date as well. Luckily it seems that these chromas may only be timed exclusives.

"4. How do the giveaways work?
Every few patches, one of the new skins will include an exclusive chroma only available through codes given to content creators. There may be ways for other players to obtain those chromas in the future, but donâ€™t have plans for that at the moment."

for reference:
https://partners.leagueoflegends.com/en_AU/ 

So yes it does suck for the moment, but at the very least it does look like we may get access to it eventually and they have stated it is not a true limited chroma. We just do not know how yet or how long it will take if they do make it available later. The most we can do at the moment is state our concern so they do follow through on making another way to obtain it in the future (Hopefully they do not add another layer of exclusivity to it like a border if they do though as that would suck).
